event.description: Emilio Bonifacio strikes out swinging, catcher Chris Iannetta to first baseman Todd Helton.
Chris Coghlan called out on strikes.
Hanley Ramirez homers (6) on a fly ball to left field.
Jorge Cantu grounds out sharply, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Todd Helton.
John Baker homers (3) on a fly ball to center field.
Cody Ross flies out to center fielder Ryan Spilborghs.

Ricky Nolasco singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Emilio Bonifacio grounds into a force out, third baseman Ian Stewart to second baseman Clint Barmes. Ricky Nolasco out at 2nd. Emilio Bonifacio to 1st.
Chris Coghlan walks. Emilio Bonifacio to 2nd.
Hanley Ramirez singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Seth Smith, deflected by third baseman Ian Stewart. Emilio Bonifacio scores. Chris Coghlan to 2nd.
